notes: Winter version of the [[Rabbit]]. In the days surrounding the [[Wikipedia:Easter|Easter]] holiday, silver rabbits can also drop [[Coloured Egg (Blue)|Blue]], [[Coloured Egg (Green)|Green]], [[Coloured Egg (Purple)|Purple]], [[Coloured Egg (Red)|Red]] and [[Coloured Egg (Yellow)|Yellow Coloured Eggs]].
name: Silver Rabbit
bestiarytext: The Silver Rabbit is the northern cousin of the common brown rabbit. It's a harmless and peaceful herbivore that survives even the hazards of the icy north. Its survivability is actually that good that it might have had become a plague in this area were it not for the numerous hunters that prey on this species.
location: A lot of places on the [[Ice Islands]] and one on [[Rookgaard]] (unreachable).
